sentences.sentence: He told me that he is in negations to re-acquire the rights to Babylon 5 and it looks pretty good.
sentences.translation: 他告诉我说，他是在反对中重新获得了《巴比伦5号》的授权，这看起来很棒。

sentences.sentence: One of the most important negations he made was to make sure he owned the masters to his own music.
sentences.translation: 其中最重要的是否定了他的主人，使他拥有自己的音乐。

sentences.sentence: The auxiliary forms of need are used primarily in present-tense questions, negations, and conditional clauses.
sentences.translation: Need的助动词形式主要用于现在时态的疑问句、否定句和条件句中。
